title: Order and pay for your order without a waiter

seo.title: Skip the lines and order food from one screen - Comandos
seo.description: Are you a fastfood restaurant? Do you sell burgers, shawarmas or fast food to the public? Kiosko is for you.

sections.description:
mipOS Kiosko is a solution for restaurants that have a high frequency of customers ordering take-away food in person. Kiosko allows your to take the order and pay in one go.

We achieved a 25% reduction in the time it took a customer to order, wait for their order and receive it.

sections.title: Places with amazing food and lots of hungry users

items.title: The challenge
items.description: Create a great product to simplify the operation of up to 40 tablets on a single device.
list: Hundreds of orders coming in at the same time
Order status and sales reports for each delivery app and each brand

items.title: Starting the process
items.description: It was key to understand the whole life time of the service, at what moment the user interacts with Kiosko and under which average psychological stage the person was at. Was it common to go with friends? with small children?.

items.title: Super fast MVP
items.description: In 30 days we were able to create a super mvp to test with users, the first test was done in Bogota. After all the feedback we received we were able to have the product finished in 60 days.

sections.description: We integrate with Rappi Pay, Stripe and cash payments with an incredible product selection and payment experience.
sections.title: A result as great as its purpose

comment.text: “It was a huge challenge, at the time Comandos was in a different country than the launching country and could not travel in the short term. I handled everything so neatly that we didn’t have to iterate, it was a gear that worked perfectly.

sections.title: The result was an innovation in the restaurant world

items.title: Constant testing
items.description: We had a quick adoption in a specific target of bars and restaurants. The secret was to keep a constant test of the customers’ sensation at checkout. Do you feel that your order was received correctly?.

items.title: Exponential growth
list: We improve adaptability according to the restaurant. We also created a version for malls.
In the mall version you start by selecting the restaurant you want to eat at and then access the menu.
